Never be afraid of who you are. Killing yourself would result in more heartbreak and pain than you coming out anyways. They're your parents. They'll love you no matter what, even if they don't agree with your sexuality. Don't be afraid to DM me if you need anything!

I distinctly remember my first time. I was so young. I was going into 5th grade and it was summer. I've always been bullied, I think that's what caused the buildup. But I also didn't get along with my parents. One day it was particularly bad of a fight. I went into my room, locked my door, and cried for an hour or so. Something sort of snapped in me and I reached over and grabbed scissors off my nightstand and started sawing away at my right forearm. It was surprisingly deep. Right after I had finished and cleaned up the blood, I was confused as to why I did this for I had never heard of people harming themselves in such a way. But I felt this sense of calm and peace roll over my body and I quit crying and laid down to sleep. That was how my 4-5 years of selfharm began.
